title: Wallis Simpson
summary: Wallis, Duchess of Windsor (born Bessie Wallis Warfield; June 19, 1896[1] – April 24, 1986), known as Wallis Simpson, was an American socialite and wife of the Duke of Windsor, the former King-Emperor Edward VIII. Their intention to marry and her status as a divorcée caused a constitutional crisis that led to Edward's abdication.
